prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
You are certainly no friend of mine. You have accused me of lying about what you had said, and run away when I proved by actual quotation that the accusation was false. We both know that, even though you praise humility, you are not humble enough to apologize.

 You sneered at my combat experience, saying "A lot of so called "combat veterans" of Vietnam smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite" and "So when you were an Army officer in Vietnam (even though you spent your time inside of Danang airbase, with at least two battalions of infantry marines on the wire ) what was the combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol?" An actual friend would not have written such things.

No, you are no friend of mine, you ignorant, arrogant, hypocritical blow-hard. You should be able to guess that I do not feel friendly towards you
stories:
It's clear that you aren't someone I would consider a friend. You've made false accusations about me, and instead of acknowledging your mistake when presented with the truth, you chose to avoid the situation. Despite your public declarations of valuing humility, you lack the humility to admit your errors and apologize.

Furthermore, you have mocked my military experience by saying things like "many self-proclaimed 'combat veterans' of Vietnam had more encounters with call girls than cordite" and questioning the combat load of M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol during my time as an Army officer in Vietnam, where I was stationed inside Danang airbase, surrounded by at least two infantry marine battalions. A true friend would not say such things.

To put it bluntly, you are not a friend of mine. I think you are ignorant, arrogant, and hypocritical. I'm sure you can deduce that I do not hold you in high regard.

Your actions indicate that I cannot count you among my friends. You have made untrue statements about me and, when confronted with the facts, chose to ignore the situation instead of acknowledging your error and apologizing. Despite your claims of valuing humility, you have shown a lack of it.

Additionally, you have shown disrespect for my military experience. For example, you have made comments such as "many self-proclaimed 'combat veterans' of Vietnam had more encounters with call girls than cordite" and questioned the amount of M-16 ammunition carried by soldiers on daily patrols during my time as an Army officer in Vietnam, where I was based at the Danang airbase and surrounded by at least two marine infantry battalions. A person who truly values friendship would not say such things.

To be straightforward, I do not consider you a friend. I believe you are ignorant, arrogant, and hypocritical, and it is clear that I do not have a high opinion of you.

The things you've done suggest that I cannot consider you a friend. You have spoken falsely about me and, when faced with the truth, decided to ignore the issue rather than admitting your mistake and apologizing. Despite your declarations of valuing humility, you have demonstrated the opposite.

Furthermore, you have shown disrespect for my military background. For instance, you have made remarks such as "many self-proclaimed 'combat veterans' of Vietnam had more experiences with call girls than cordite" and doubted the amount of M-16 ammunition that soldiers carried during daily patrols in the time I served as an Army officer in Vietnam, based at the Danang airbase and surrounded by at least two marine infantry battalions. A true friend would not say such things.

To be clear, I do not hold you in high regard as a friend. I believe you are uninformed, arrogant, and hypocritical, and it is evident that I have a low opinion of you.

A true friend would not say such things.
